message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for us to work together. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I think that's a fair price for the product.
I understand that $9000 is a bit below my target, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $11000. This is my best price for now.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that price. I can go up to $10500, but that's as high as I'm willing to go.
I understand that you're trying to find a sweet spot, but I'm not willing to go below $12000. I can offer you a slight discount, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to sell it to you for $11500.
I appreciate the slight discount, but I'm still a bit above that price. I can meet you at $11000, but that's my final offer.

I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I still think the product is worth more to you than that. I'm willing to meet you at $11000, but I need to make sure I'm not leaving money on the table. I'm willing to throw in a small bonus to sweeten the deal. I'll sell it to you for $11000, but I'll also include a 2-year warranty and priority support. That's my final offer.
I appreciate the additional perks, but I'm still a bit above the price. I can meet you at $10800, but that's as high as I'm willing to go.
